files.patch:
@@ -919,1 +919,5 @@
-                    && this.reservedStreamCount.get() == 0;
+                    && this.reservedStreamCount.get() == 0
+                    // a connection in the pool could be marked as
+                    // finalStream (for example when it receives a GOAWAY). we don't want
+                    // to generate explicit QUIC traffic for such connections too.
+                    && !this.finalStream;
